text:
@realDonaldTrump And reopen Covid19 to spread again while you hide in your bubble you know the virus will take you out 
Lying Donald has lost the confidence of the American people 70.000 +death's and climbing 
It's in your wheelhouse now 
Run Donald run 
You are an idiot

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
